numbered_ace_sentences: 2. The United States is a country.
4. China appears to use the most clean energy among China and the United States and India.
6. The United States mainly uses fossil fuels.
8. I wonder what a breaking point will be.
9. A breaking point can cause more places to switch to clean energy.
10. Some places try to switch to only clean energy.
11. The cost of clean energy can be expensive.
13. The United States may start to run out of fossil fuels.
14. The United States may be unable to purchase fossil fuels from other countries.
15. If the United States starts to run out of fossil fuels, people may struggle to afford using clean energy all the time.
16. If the United States is unable to purchase fossil fuels from other countries, people may struggle to afford using clean energy all the time.
17. The headline is: The future towards clean energy.
